sentences.en: Today is Tina's first day of school.

sentences.de: Sie trägt eine bunte Schultüte voller Süßigkeiten.
sentences.en: She is carrying a colourful school cone filled with sweets.
Tina is a little bit excited.

sentences.de: Die Lehrerin heißt Frau Richter und lächelt freundlich.
sentences.en: The teacher is called Mrs Richter and smiles kindly.

sentences.de: Nach der Schule sagt Tina: Es war schön!
sentences.en: After school Tina says: it was nice!

vocabulary.meaning: school cone (given on first day of school)
